Good morning,

Hostibox International Group Ltd is a well established company in UK. We provide cloud based services and software development services.

Hostibox.com is our brand specialized in cloud web hosting.

Today, we are happy to bring you lifetime discounts on our VPS range. Coupon-code: CYBERMONDAY2018 (valid until 30th November)

US location (Kansas City)

Unlimited bandwidth @ 10 Gbit/s port (best-effort)
99.9% uptime SLA
7 days money back guarantee

Credit card (via Stripe), Bitcoin and altcoins (via CoinGate)
